title: Implement James Algebra axioms (Inversion, Arrangement, Reflection)
Extract paired boundary check in clarify logic
Clean up clarify implementation in Axioms.ts
Use terse helper names in clarify
Split axiom tests into per-axiom suites
Enhance Clarify tests with property/property coverage
Promote traverse helpers to Form utilities
Improve documentation for disperse edge case and overall project docs
Relax Disperse guard for Square selection
Build canonicalSignature-based MVP UI
description: Create a minimal React interface that renders the current Form forest using canonicalSignature text so we can playtest without waiting on Pixi assets. Should support selecting nodes, invoking the three axioms through buttons or radial menu placeholders, and showing goal state + win feedback.

title: Review level spacing/numbering after implementing levels 0-5.1
description: After implementing tutorial levels 0-5.1, review if levels 5.5, 6, 7.x cluster too much complexity. Consider spacing them out (e.g., 6, 7, 8.5, 9.5) or renumbering the entire sequence for clearer progression. Test playability before deciding.

title: Implement Zustand game state store
description: Design the primary Zustand store to hold current form(s), selected nodes, move history, active level metadata, and UI state. Integrate the logic engine helpers so actions dispatch mutations, and expose selectors/hooks the React components can use.

title: Define initial level data pipeline
description: Stand up the JSON level format described in README, seed a handful of tutorial levels, and build a loader that hydrates the Zustand store on startup. Include goal form + allowed axioms so the MVP UI can drive win checking.

title: Streamline repository onboarding experience
description: Audit the repository structure, README, and supporting docs so newcomers can quickly grasp Icon's goals and architecture. Reorganize folders if needed, clarify setup instructions, highlight demo entry points, and surface key concepts (Iconic Arithmetic, houses/emojis) for educators evaluating the project.
acceptance_criteria: Document current pain points for new visitors; Deliver updated README/structure proposal or implement improvements; Ensure demo instructions and narrative context are obvious for prospective partners.

title: Write unit tests for axiom operations
Design radial action menu interactions
description: Prototype the Fly-Pie inspired radial menu for selecting axioms: tap/hold to open, show context-sensitive options, handle touch + mouse, and integrate with the Zustand store's selected node state.

title: Prototype bounding box dialect renderer
description: Swap out the network dialect visuals for a bounding box / bucket dialect in PixiJS so forms read like 2D shapes. Build a scene graph abstraction layer we can reuse when we add art assets.

title: Set up animation pipeline with GSAP
description: Integrate GSAP timelines for axiom animations (inversion, arrangement, reflection) plus selection feedback. Establish easing presets and hooks so state transitions trigger the correct animations.

title: Verify gameStore gameOperations match axiom behaviours
Add gameStore tests for axiom guard enforcement
Cover arrangement edge cases in gameStore tests
Cover reflection edge cases in gameStore tests
Explore property-based testing for gameStore operations
Restore network dialect interface
Failing property test: reflection survivors do not retain expected structure
Operation building & execution
Audit technical debt hotspots
description: Take inventory of refactoring opportunities across the codebase (rendering, state management, build tooling). Identify brittle modules, missing abstractions, and outdated dependencies, then prioritize follow-up refactors based on impact.
acceptance_criteria: List top technical debt areas with context and impact; Recommend next actions (refactor tickets, dependency upgrades, tooling tweaks); File follow-up issues for any concrete refactors discovered.

title: Implement win condition checker
Failing property test: reflection survivors do not retain expected structure
description: Property-based test failure in reflection.property.test.ts. Counterexample: two angle forms, one with nested angle child. Expected survivor structure 'angle:[]' but received 'angle:[angle:[angle:[]]]'. Full error details in error.txt.

title: Improve action button naming for clarity (clarify/enfold/etc)
Fix cancel operation interaction
Rework subtraction level 4-2
Enable parent selection via edges in network UI
Allow choosing collect destination boundary
Add gameplay analytics for interaction patterns
Hide disabled axioms in tutorial levels
Render goal signature using network view
Restore goal network preview in HUD
Collect action ignores selected square context
Action previews + compact axiom layout
description: Add hoverable before/after previews for axiom actions, improve disabled-state contrast/newly enabled highlights, and switch to flexible multi-column layout with redundant copy removed.

title: Implement undo/redo system
Cancel should respect sibling angle context
Align reflection cancel property tests with partial annihilation
Fix slow test case generation for hard difficulty
description: Hard test cases (depth 7-10) take too long to generate. Need to optimize the generation algorithm or simplification process.

title: Add 5+ intermediate levels between basics and multiplication challenges
Fix gameStore tests failing after tutorial persist changes
Preserve variable ids during clone
Right-click detection & menu state
Implement move eligibility checking
Disperse keeps selected contents together
description: Update Disperse so when multiple children of a square are selected, they are dispersed together into shared frames rather than independently. Preserve legacy single-selection behaviour, adjust preview guard, and cover with tests.

title: Fix 4Ã—2 to 4/2 difficulty cliff with intermediate steps
Provide two enfold variants
Set up Vite + React + TypeScript project
Add movement SVGs to action previews and buttons
Implement form data structures
Add sandbox axiom placement actions
Layout cleanup & sidebar removal
Refactor Clarify applicability condition in Axioms.ts
Extract explicit guard functions for operations
Radial Menu UX Redesign
Add 'collect' tutorial level before it's required in puzzles
Redesign levels 1-8 based on playtest feedback and new UI
Extract explicit guard helpers for operations
description: Refactor guard logic across operations (clarify, disperse, cancel, collect) into named helper predicates to reduce duplication between availability checks and execution preview. Document selection semantics via JSDoc.

title: Suggest selections guidance
description: Prototype visual hints that recommend promising node selections before actions are attempted. Explore heuristics beyond brute-force simulation to identify complementary nodes, and surface the recommendations in the UI.

title: Relax Cancel guard for angle content selection
Preview integration
Refine action glyph SVGs to align with axiom rules
Relax action application guards
description: Review the current guard clauses that restrict applying actions/axioms in the game logic. Identify overly strict conditions that block intended moves, document rationale for each guard, and experiment with loosening them while keeping invalid states impossible. Update tests or add coverage to ensure relaxed rules do not reintroduce past bugs.
acceptance_criteria: Catalogue existing action application guards and the scenarios they cover; Propose revised guard logic with risk assessment; Deliver implementation or follow-up issues to adjust guards plus accompanying tests.

title: Implement LoF Arithmetic Eval Suite v0
description: Literate org-mode notebook with form generator, ground-truth simplifier, LLM API calls, and results logging for testing if LLMs understand Laws of Form arithmetic (I1, I2 axioms)

title: Epic: Magical-realist v2.0 - enchanted spaces, physics, mirror worlds, glowing forms
RadialMenu component 6-wedge layout
Sandbox submenu 4-way layout
Infuse Bauhaus dumpling aesthetic
description: Refresh site backgrounds and panel visuals with a Bauhaus-meets-dumpling vibe. Explore color palettes, geometric patterns, and playful dumpling motifs that align with the Icon narrative while maintaining accessibility. Deliver moodboard options and translate the chosen direction into CSS/theme tokens or component updates.
acceptance_criteria: Produce inspiration references or moodboard; Select palette/pattern direction with accessibility notes; Outline or implement concrete styling updates (CSS variables, assets, component tweaks).

title: Add error feedback explaining why actions fail or are disabled
Implement composite test evaluation mode
Visual polish & animations
Relax Disperse guard for square selection
description: Allow Disperse to trigger when the Square boundary itself is selected, dispersing all of its contents without requiring the grandchildren to be selected individually. Update guard logic, preview handling, and tests to support the new pathway.

title: Add tutorial step framework for guided onboarding
Improve goal preview readability for deep forms
description: Improve goal preview readability for deep forms. Also increase atom glyph size and label legibility.

title: Game page text color adjustments
Investigate Dark Reader SVG color inconsistencies
description: Dark Reader extension applies high-contrast color filters to our SVG assets inconsistently, leading to unreadable or mismatched icon colors in dark mode. Reproduce the issue across representative pages, audit current SVG fill/stroke usage, and determine whether we can adjust markup, CSS, or theming metadata to keep colors consistent when Dark Reader is enabled.
acceptance_criteria: Reproduce Dark Reader color issue on key SVGs; Document root cause and affected assets; Provide fix or follow-up change recommendation (code tweak, docs, or new issue).

title: Relax Cancel guard for angle content selection
description: Let Cancel be triggered when a reflection angle's inner content is selected by automatically targeting the enclosing angle form alongside the matching base. Update guard logic, pairing resolution, and tests.

title: Widen axiom action previews and redesign arrangement glyph
Design storytelling Home page for Icon
description: Add a welcoming Home page that introduces the Icon mission, the system of houses/emojis, and the Iconic Arithmetic concept through narrative cues. Explore layout, copy, and illustrative assets (e.g., SVG, interactive snippets) that help first-time visitors understand the value proposition before diving into gameplay.
acceptance_criteria: Draft narrative structure covering mission, houses, emojis, and Iconic Arithmetic; Produce wireframe or content outline for the Home page hero + supporting sections; Identify implementation tasks or assets needed to build the page.

title: Refine action guard architecture
description: Break up gameStore and useAvailableOperations guard logic into modular helpers/stores, reduce duplication, and document selection semantics to make ongoing maintenance manageable.
notes: Break guard availability/preview duplication: extract shared builders (disperse/cancel/collect) into selectionGuards module, move previewOperation branches alongside operation logic, and document selection semantics via JSDoc.

title: Add intermediate reasoning trace validation
description: Current eval only checks final answer (50% chance of false positive). Need to validate step-by-step reasoning traces against ground truth simplification steps.

title: Mobile touch support
